text:
="preserve">Danna Maria García Osuna (born 4 February 1978) is a Colombian actress and model. She was born in Medellín. She is best known for her roles in telenovelas. Her most notable credits include "Pasión de Gavilanes", "Qué bonito amor" and "El Señor de los Cielos".
In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, García tested positive for COVID-19.
